summary: BuildRequest specified no requirements and explicitly called for no additional changes. The diff introduces new frontend and backend functionality (URL/session param utilities, admin token handling in actor creation, and a user-approval/access-control system in the Motoko backend), including modifications to files that were declared immutable and backend logic that was declared a non-goal.

hallucinated_features.description: Added URL parameter/sessionStorage utilities for extracting and persisting URL parameters (including hash/query parsing and clearing params from hash).
hallucinated_features.reason: No new features were requested; BuildRequest states 'no additional changes requested' and 'Requirements: none'.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed actor initialization to read a secret/admin token from URL parameters and call backend initialization with that secret; added query invalidation/refetch behavior tied to actor changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: No new features were requested; additionally this modifies an immutable frontend path per constraints.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/expanded backend user-approval and access-control endpoints and added profile storage gated by approval/admin checks (e.g., isCallerApproved, requestApproval, setApproval, listApprovals, save/get profiles, role queries/assignment).
hallucinated_features.reason: No new features were requested; additionally, backend changes were explicitly a non-goal ('Backend changes ... must not require Motoko/backend changes'), yet backend/main.mo was modified.
